code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactComponent=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log('Nome:',name);console.log('E-mail:',email);console.log('Mensagem:',message);setName('');setEmail('');setMessage('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact",id:"contato",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Formul\xE1rio de Contato"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nome",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"E-mail",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Mensagem",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Enviar"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Informa\xE7\xF5es de Contato"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["E-mail: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"mailto:kferreira_@outlook.com?subject=Curr\xEDculo Web&body=",children:"kferreira_@outlook.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["LinkedIn: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/karla-ferreira-rural/",children:"karla-ferreira-rural"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["GitHub: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://github.com/kfrural",children:"kfrural"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Instagrem: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://www.instagram.com/kf.rural/",children:"@kf.rural"})]})]})]});};export default ContactComponent;
